      • validWord

        public static boolean validWord(String word)
        Tests whether the provided string encodes a valid JSON document. That is, the string must begin by {} and end by {@code \}.
        Parameters:
        word -
        Returns:

      • escapeSymbolsForJSON

        public static String escapeSymbolsForJSON(String string)
        We escape the "\S", "\E", "\I", and "\D" symbols in the document (to avoid errors from JSONObject). That means we replace every \\([SIDE]) by \\\\$1.
        Parameters:
        string - The string to escape
        Returns:
        The escaped string
